meta.title: FutureUp Academy — Azerbaijan's #1 IT Academy
meta.description: Programming, design, data analytics and cybersecurity courses. Build your future with us!

hero.title: Build Your Future
hero.subtitle: Azerbaijan's leading IT Academy. Learn programming, design, data analytics and more from professional instructors.

courses.title: Popular Courses
courses.subtitle: Discover our most popular courses
courses.frontendDesc: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React and modern web technologies.
courses.backendJavaDesc: Master Java, Spring Boot, microservices, databases and server-side architecture.
courses.backendCsharpDesc: Learn C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET, databases and enterprise software development.
courses.mobileDesc: Learn iOS and Android app development, React Native/Flutter, mobile UI and API integration.
courses.redTeamDesc: Master penetration testing, vulnerability analysis, attack techniques and ethical hacking.
courses.blueTeamDesc: Learn network defense, incident response, SIEM systems and security monitoring.
courses.purpleTeamDesc: Offensive-defensive team collaboration, security assessment and risk mitigation strategies.
courses.whiteTeamDesc: Information security management, risk analysis, compliance standards and audit procedures.
courses.cyberOpsDesc: Cyber threat intelligence, SOC operations, digital forensics and incident response operations.
courses.aiMlDesc: Master machine learning algorithms, neural networks, NLP and practical AI applications.
courses.dataEngDesc: Learn data pipelines, ETL processes, database architecture and big data technologies.
courses.dataAnalyticsDesc: Master data analysis, visualization, SQL, Python and business analytics.
courses.devopsDesc: Master CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, cloud services and infrastructure automation.
courses.devsecopsDesc: Secure development practices, CI/CD security, code auditing and automated security testing.
courses.helpdeskDesc: User support, technical troubleshooting, ticketing systems and customer service fundamentals.
courses.systemsDesc: Operating systems, network infrastructure, server management and system administration.
courses.designDesc: Learn the fundamentals of user interface and user experience design.
courses.marketingDesc: Learn SMM, SEO, content marketing and digital advertising strategies.
courses.qaDesc: Software testing, test automation, quality standards and QA methodologies.
courses.productOwnerDesc: Product management, Agile/Scrum, user stories and business analytics fundamentals.
courses.scratchDesc: Visual programming for beginners aged 7-10. Create games and animations.
courses.pythonKidsDesc: Learn real programming with Python. Build games and fun projects.
courses.webKidsDesc: Create your own websites with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
courses.cyberKidsDesc: Online safety rules, personal data protection and cyberbullying defense.
courses.aiKidsDesc: Discover AI, build creative projects with AI tools and learn how machines think.
courses.robloxDesc: Create 3D games in Roblox Studio using Lua programming language.

why.title: Why FutureUp?

why.certificateDesc: Receive a recognized certificate upon course completion
why.mentorshipDesc: Individual approach and mentor support for every student
why.practiceDesc: Gain experience by working on real-world projects
why.careerDesc: Help graduates find jobs and provide recommendations
why.flexibleDesc: Morning, evening, and weekend groups available
why.modernDesc: Curriculum updated to match market demands

testimonials.title: Our Graduates Say
testimonials.subtitle: Success stories
testimonials.testimonial1Text: The Frontend course at FutureUp Academy changed my life. In 6 months I became a professional developer from scratch.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: In the design course I gained both theoretical and practical knowledge. Teachers are very professional.
testimonials.testimonial3Text: Thanks to the Data Analytics course, I developed my analytical thinking skills.

about.title: About FutureUp Academy
about.subtitle: Azerbaijan's leading IT education platform since 2023
about.storyText: FutureUp Academy was founded with a simple mission — to provide world-class IT education accessible to everyone in Azerbaijan.
about.missionText: Empowering the next generation of tech professionals with practical skills, mentorship, and career support.
about.visionText: To become the leading IT academy in the Caucasus region, producing graduates who drive innovation globally.
about.value1Desc: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do
about.value2Desc: Constantly evolving our curriculum to match industry trends
about.value3Desc: Building a supportive network of learners and professionals
about.value4Desc: Making quality IT education available to everyone
about.value5Desc: Learning by doing with real-world projects and challenges
about.value6Desc: Committed to continuous personal and professional development
about.ctaSubtitle: Start your IT career with FutureUp Academy today

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest from FutureUp Academy
news.article1Excerpt: We are excited to announce our new React & Next.js focused frontend development course starting February 2025.
news.article2Excerpt: FutureUp Academy signs partnerships with top tech companies in Azerbaijan to provide internship opportunities.
news.article3Title: Student Success Story: From Zero to Developer
news.article3Excerpt: How our graduate Farid went from no coding experience to landing his dream job in just 6 months.
news.article4Excerpt: Join our upcoming cybersecurity workshop and learn about the latest trends in information security.
news.article5Excerpt: FutureUp Academy is expanding with a brand new modern campus in the heart of Baku.
news.article6Excerpt: Our latest data analytics bootcamp graduates achieved a 95% employment rate within 3 months.

contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our academy
faq.a1: FutureUp Academy is Azerbaijan's leading IT education academy offering professional courses in programming, design, data analytics, and cybersecurity.
faq.a2: No! We offer courses for all levels — from complete beginners to advanced professionals.
faq.a3: Course duration varies from 3 to 6 months depending on the program.
faq.a4: Upon successful completion, you receive a FutureUp Academy certificate with a unique QR code that can be verified on our website.
faq.a5: We offer morning (10:00-13:00), evening (18:00-21:00), and weekend groups.
faq.a6: Course prices vary by program. Contact us for current pricing and available payment plans.
faq.q7: Do you offer job placement assistance?
faq.a7: Yes! We provide career support including resume reviews, interview preparation, and connections with our partner companies.
faq.a8: Course transfers are possible within the first 2 weeks of the program.
faq.ctaSubtitle: Contact us and we'll be happy to help

footer.description: Azerbaijan's leading IT education academy. Build your future with us!
